alert.note: Alert for Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin; Southwestern St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 23 at 12:18PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...Rain changing to snow with flash freeze expected over the St Lawrence Valley this afternoon... A sharp cold front will quickly change rain to snow with rapidly falling temperatures on developing gusty southwest winds of 40 to 50 mph. This could cause a potential flash freeze on area roads and result in slick and hazardous travel this afternoon. Precautionary/Preparedness Actions... Icy roads are possible...producing hazardous travel conditions. If you must travel, please use caution. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.

area.areaDesc: Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin; Southwestern St. Lawrence
